column4: Hi All:  i installed the ubuntu jackalope and my display is unable to show in 1024*764 resolution. can some one please help me ?
Hi All:  i installed the ubuntu jackalope and my display is unable to show in 1024*764 resolution. can some one please help me ?Xorg file is not there
upgrade to a more recent version of ubuntu. they include better video card support
well if the resolution worked in previous version in this one it shuld work like that ? dont you think so ? i have a intel onboard 945gsm graphihc card
